actions.text: On agreeing to the Berman amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 276 (Roll no. 377).

description: Amendment sought to delete provisions establishing a new Defense Export Loan Guarantee Program.
purpose: An amendment to strike provisions establishing a new Defense Export Loan Guarantee Program, under which DOD would guarantee loans made by private lenders for defense related purchases by NATO member countries and other U.S. allies.
